item.title: Move your app from Parcel to Vite
item.description: Below are the list of changes needed to switch from Parcel to Vite: changes in package.json empty out the script object Remove all things related to parcel such as for me its as mentioned below: * “@parcel/transformer-sass” * “parcel”: “^2.8.2”, Run npm i to remove all the packages. Remove .parcel-cache I had one project setup with vite in my machine so I copied the packages needed and vite scripts object to package.
